para.emphasis: Problem displaying component names from browsers

listitem.para: In some siutations, when viewing the Component Names View from a browser, you may see GUIDs (a long number/character string) instead of the component name.
This is a problem displaying the component name at the moment and can be considered a display error, albeit a serious one.
The component names themselves are correct, and can be seen either by opening the editor, or by refreshing the Project.

para.emphasis: Issue with incorrect handling of null in renderers fixed

listitem.para: Renderers in Swing that return null can now be correctly handled.
See http://eclip.se/426978 for more details.
We have updated the version of Selenium used for HTML tests to 2.39.

para.emphasis: Port number for embedded AUT Agent changed

listitem.para: The default port number for the embedded AUT Agent is now 60001.
You can change the default port number in the preferences.

para.emphasis: Table view has been removed from the Object Mapping Editor

listitem.para: The table view has been removed from the Object Mapping Editor.

para.emphasis: Problems opening BIRT reports when using IE11

listitem.para: There is a known issue with BIRT reporting that occurs when using Internet Explorer 11.

There is a ticket open in the GUIdancer Bugzilla (https://bugzilla.bredex.de/show_bug.cgi?id=1281) and in the Eclipse Bugzilla (http://eclip.se/422056) for this. The ticket in the Eclipse Bugzilla documents workarounds.
As of this version, Java 1.4 AUTs are no longer testable with the ITE.

para.emphasis: Changes to the launcher for the AUT Agent

listitem.para: The AUT Agent is no longer available under the name autagent-lin or autagent-sol.
Use the launcher autagent instead.
There are still some issues running tests on Mac machines with Java 7. We suggest using Java 6 on Mac machines for the moment.

para.emphasis: Working directory for ITE and AUT Agent on Linux

listitem.para: The AUT Agent and the ITE now use the current directory as their working directory on Linux systems.
We have updated the version of Java installed with the ITE to version 7.
You will need Java 7 installed to be able to run the installer.
We no longer support testing on iOS 5.0 AUTs.

para.emphasis: Working with RDP connections on Windows 8

listitem.para: Windows 8 users working with RDP connections for test execution should ensure that they have installed all updates for Windows.

para.emphasis: Updated the version of EclipseLink used

listitem.para: In this version, we have switched to EclipseLink 2.5.1 and JPA 2.1.0.
We no longer execute tests on Vista: the support for Vista has been removed for this version.

para.emphasis: Multi-window mode for HTML testing on Mac OSX

listitem.para: There are known issues with starting AUTs that are using the multi-window mode on Mac OSX, both in Firefox and Safari.
We have removed these combinations from our tests.

para.emphasis: Pure SWT AUTs no longer tested

listitem.para: We no longer execute regression tests on pure SWT AUTs. We do, however, perform various tests on RCP, which uses SWT components.

para.emphasis: AUT Agent started without console per default

listitem.para: The standalone AUT Agent is now started without a console per default.
If you would like to see the console when starting the AUT Agent, you must adapt the autagent.ini file.
In the -vm parameter, use java instead of javaw.
